title: Blazing School Day
description: Survive the chaos of a school day gone wrong!

stages.name: Burning School Gym
stages.description: The school gym is ablaze with unnatural fire! Defeat the fiery enemies and find a way forward.

stages.name: School Corridor
stages.description: You reach a seemingly calm corridor. There are some useful items left behind.

choices.name: First Aid Kit
choices.description: Heal a chosen character to full HP.

choices.name: Red Adrenaline
choices.description: Inject a chosen character with adrenaline, boosting their physical damage by 20%.

choices.name: Student's Book
choices.description: Apply learned knowledge to a chosen character, increasing all stats.

stages.name: School Yard
stages.description: The school yard crackles with heat. Five Blazing Elementals block the path!

stages.name: Classroom 5B Door
stages.description: You find a locked classroom door. Perhaps someone inside can help?

stages.name: Rooftop
stages.description: The school rooftop offers a vantage point, but a fearsome Infernal Scorpion guards it.

stages.name: Final Choice
stages.description: After the rooftop battle, you find a strange altar with three options.

choices.name: Mysterious Font
choices.description: Revive a fallen ally, restoring them to 50% HP.

choices.name: First Aid Kit
choices.description: Heal a chosen character to full HP.

choices.name: Risky Medicine
choices.description: A potent concoction. 50% chance to double the character's Max HP (and fully heal), 50% chance to defeat them instantly.

stages.name: Bathroom Entrance
stages.description: You hear sounds of struggle near the bathroom. Someone is bravely fighting Mr. Birdie, the corrupted cleaning man! Maybe they could join you?

stages.name: Bathroom Fight
stages.description: Infernal Birdie, the corrupted cleaning man, attacks with deadly chains!

stages.name: Principal's Office
stages.description: You've reached the Principal's office. Choose one final ally to face whatever awaits.

stages.name: Returning to the Burning School Gym
stages.description: The flames rage anew! The mastermind behind this chaos, Headmaster Infernus, awaits in the restored inferno.

title: Corruption at the Farmland
description: Something is wrong in the peaceful farmland...

stages.name: An Angry Carrot
stages.description: A strangely aggressive carrot blocks the path into the farmland.

stages.name: Cottage
stages.description: You find a small cottage. Inside, a few farmhands are taking shelter. Perhaps one could join you?
